INFO

Session Options & Pricing


I offer individual and group sessions to capture your graduation memories!

• $30 per hour for one person

• $10 extra per additional person per hour

As a student myself, I’ve set my rates to be budget-friendly while still delivering high-quality photos.



What's Included?


• On-location shoots near Pitt, CMU, or Duquesne—or anywhere in Pittsburgh!

• Unlimited locations & outfit changes.

• Pose guides & inspiration—I can provide printed guides and a Pinterest board for ideas.

When Should I Book?


• Sessions are available weekdays and weekends until May 7th.

• Anytime, 7am - 8pm. The best lighting is after sunrise or before sunset!


What do I get?


• ALL digital photos!!!

• Same day access via Google Drive.

• Optional editing and touchups on select photos.

WANT TO BOOK?
